The menu of tourbag card in STK should be valid after successfully activation Manual activate 1.The package will be activated automatically after purchase, please insure your registration sim inserted into your mobile and the mobile network is ok. \n2.The activation is done through SMS and SMS has some delay about 1-5 minutes. Please close wifi to insure mobile network ok \n3.If the menu of tourbag card in STK is invalid, please activate by manual \n4.You can call (+86)4001-0303-98 for help. before going abroad Detect package Buy plan Abroad call Close abroad call abroad Switch SIM Card Switch Network settings Delete APN after abroad Turn on data roaming Switch to tourbag card or main card When you are aboard, you can switch between tourbag card and main card. 3-5minutes is necessary for sim card. In this duration please don’t operate STK menu. When you go back home country, please switch network to main card, then delete APN. After that you can use your mobile network. When you go back home country, please switch network to main card, then delete APN. After that you can use your mobile network personal center Please configure APN, open "Data usage" and "Data Roaming" , then you can use network. message without login Detect itourbag card message detail - 点击开通,复制开通指令(请在登机前使用您国内电话卡进行设置并保持网络通畅) - 点击关闭,复制关闭指令 - 打开手机拨号盘,长按"粘贴"并拨打 其他开启方式 如果拨号后语音提示：您未开通呼叫转移这项服务 那您可以尝试其它开方式,将来电转移至 Continues means you’ve read and agreed to our 《Terms of Service and Privacy Policy》 Popular packages To two input is inconsistent original password is mistake view or edit the personal data communication server has been disconnected, please login again voice code message code bind iccid password missed call itourbag! you have missed call
